name: Web Contre Jour
description: Contre Jour is a good casual puzzle game. Player can enjoy beautiful game video/audio, while using physical properties of all kinds of items to control the mysterious creature Petit to absorb essence scattered around all the corners, dodge all sorts of dangerous obstacles and safely pass 60 stages.

en_US.description: Contre Jour is a good casual puzzle game. Player can enjoy beautiful game video/audio, while using physical properties of all kinds of items to control the mysterious creature Petit to absorb essence scattered around all the corners, dodge all sorts of dangerous obstacles and safely pass 60 stages.
en_US.name: Contre Jour

zh_CN.description: Contre Jour是一款益智休闲游戏佳作，玩家可以一边享受美妙的游戏视听，一边利用各种道具的物理特性，控制神秘生物Petit吸收散落在各个角落的精华，躲过各类危险障碍到达目的地，安全地通过60个关卡。
zh_CN.name: Contre Jour网页版
